title: Connecting to bioregional ecological restoration efforts
description: Connecting to bioregional ecological restoration efforts
content:
Scenario: Connecting to bioregional ecological restoration efforts
    Given her bioregion needs ecological restoration
    And young adults can contribute to environmental healing
    When Aisha explores environmental participation
    Then the bioregional_elohim should surface restoration opportunities
    And it should connect her to local environmental projects
    And her ecological care work should be recognized
    And environmental stewardship should extend beyond consumption
    And she should participate in active ecological healing
    And care tokens should value environmental restoration work
